name: Tzar: The Burden of the Crown
summary:
Tzar: The Burden of the Crown is a real-time strategy game for the PC published by Take-Two Interactive and developed by the Bulgarian game developer company Haemimont Games.
The gameplay is set up in a fictional medieval age. The basic goal is to conquer the neighbouring kingdoms and destroy all traces of them, or destroy their castles, depending on selected playing mode. There are many different buildings and characters you can produce, each depending on which of the 3 races you choose to be: European, Asian or Arabian. The main differences are the types of special buildings available, and the types of troops you can make. There is also a campaign option for single players in which the player must complete specific goals, such as destroying an enemy force, or protecting a citadel from attack. The game also includes a map editor where players can create their own map to play on with strategic rivers, forests, and resources to build their armies with.

name: Tzompantli
summary: Tzompantli is a fast paced fighting game based on the comic books written and drawn by Mexican author Edgar Cl√©ment, about Angel Hunters, Archangels, Nahuales, Mexican policemen, Japanese robots and ancient demons as they battle each other trying to collect the price on the Head of the Archangel Michael.

name: TZar Excalibur
summary:
Camelot's throne is in your hands. Leading powerful armies in epic battles, gather your knights of the Round Table in search of the Holy Grail, infiltrating spies disguised to rescue Queen Guinevere, survive the dangers of the enchanted castle of Morgana, melee against your own son, Mordred the traitor ...

You will need the full power of Excalibur!

name: T-Zer0
summary:
T-Zer0 (formerly Trauma Zero) is an arcade, side scrolling, shooter with a sci-fi theme.

The game is AGA (over 256 colour graphics), scrolls at 50hz with a 2-player coop option, featuring a choice of three ships to control, two main gameplay routes with collectibles, power-ups and enemies to defeat.

name: Tzared
summary: Real-time strategy game for web browsers and PC. Play online with friends!

name: Tzar: Gold Edition
summary:
This release covers all previous Tzar games and scenarios, adding a new campaign as well as a map creator. This last feature allows for the creation of adventures with special events, conversations and rules and the ban of technologies and units at the player's pleasure. These maps are 100% compatible with the game and they can be accessed directly through it.

The aforementioned new campaign is focused on Gengis Khan's empire, showcasing it in a total of two scenarios.

name: Tzakol in Exile
summary: Turn-based roguelite with procedural generation. You can choose an adventure for a short run or for a long exploration.

name: Tzimtzum
summary: Tzimtzum is a surreal retro-styled horror game set in an office building. Explore each floor and try to exit via the elevator. Each floor becomes more unsettling and surreal. The lights may go out, but fortunately, you have a flashlight. Unfortunately, you are also not alone.

name: Tz Mini Stg Collection
summary: This book contains several of tamazusa's small-scale STG works, mainly game jam works.
